overview:
Balint Orosz is a designer and developer specializing in mobile design strategy and user experience. Balint works as user experince lead at Distinction Ltd, a professional services consultancy.

As a student Balint attended numerous student competitions, and was awarded 3rd place at the Imagine Cup 2008, in Paris, with the project Green Watering. (http://greenwatering.com)

An incessant entrepreneur, Balint continues to try new things. He and the team at Distinction launched the Cocktail Flow WP7 app in October 2010 which since is one of the highest rated apps in the WP7 marketplace.
